title: Did you guys even playtest Ekko's buffs?
body:
Like what in the actual mother fucking fuck. Why does he have two slows, a stun, two lives, two dashes, and a 3000 hp shield. OH, and guess what, if you HAPPEN to actually SOMEHOW get to him, he ALSO HAS A MOVEMENT SPEED BUFF.

How about we hotfix this CANCER out of the game so cheaters (this guy is both abusing ekko AND scripting) like this [Removed by moderation] can stop getting free wins simply by picking a champion.
